articles.description: There was a Welsh winner in the 18th edition of the Cardiff Half Marathon
articles.content:
Welsh runner Natasha Cockram was among the winners at Sunday's Cardiff Half Marathon. The 29-year-old from Cwmbran finished first in the women's race while Kadar Omar won the men's event.
